attributes.title: Very disappointed
attributes.review: This app is very much terrible I can’t believe apple would even have this on the Appstore absolutely horrific I wish I could give 0 stars.

attributes.title: horrified.
attributes.review: i used to be a trump supporter until i opened the app and saw... him. i nearly cried and i had to go to a mental hospital for 2 years because of the trauma and pain. ☹️ would NOT recommend.

attributes.title: no❤️
attributes.review: ok when i first opened up the app mr crusty cheeto man was throwing racial slurs at me and he was half naked screaming at me 😿it was just borderline disgusting 😡and all around the app is inappropriate even for adults and i read all of the other reviews and yes it is true they will steal your microwave and it’s getting on my nerves 😔so therefore this app should be removed because im offended and disgusted by how they treat people who even get the app

attributes.title: First of all he votes for him self we’re not going down with out a fight
attributes.review: I mean if you really want to ban TikTok we’ll ban your own app 😂 your built like a gorilla your a rapist and racist 😂 BLM we won’t go down with out a fight PERIODT

attributes.title: Physically Painful and Nauseating🤕
attributes.review:
Most disgusting app I’ve even downloaded🤮
Every time I opened it I got coronavirus🦠my mom fell mentally ill and my dad got cancer. My sister committed suicide when she saw that orange Cheeto’s little pp. This app destroys families and lives. DO NOT DOWNLOAD IT!

attributes.title: Not worth the time
attributes.review: I should of believed the other reviews before downloading 😭 just horrible. Every single part of it. Don’t get it or delete it!

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: I frankly am absolutely disgusted and so frustrated. I downloaded this app to support our dictator **cough** I mean president and all it did was show me APPALLING pictures of fugly Donald trump supporting that satanic kids app know as........*gag* TICTOK!!!🤮🤮 I wish I could give it a -69/10

attributes.title: Worst App 😐
attributes.review: This app is literally the worst quality thing i’ve ever seen. no one should have to suffer with the existence of this app everything about it is wrong and plain out dirty

attributes.title: Very ugly
attributes.review: This app is so bad when I got on it I saw dead animals as the cover an also i got corona from this app it is very disappointing 😡 you can download the app but I’ll make u get the corona

attributes.title: It’s a no from me...
attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app these people knocked on my door and when I opened it they ran in and stole my dog and my bowl of oranges. I can’t believe this... I will never download this app again. 😹👎❌🍊
